snippet.title: DETECTIVE  - The Motel  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2852480?utm_source=youtube
#playstation : https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012277

Detective: The Motel is an immersive deduction game that puts you in the shoes of a detective tasked with solving a mysterious crime in a rundown motel.
Armed with only a pencil and paper, you'll gather clues, interview secretive residents, and piece together hidden connections between suspects.
The challenge lies in the subtlety of the evidence—no one will help you, and the truth is hidden beneath layers of lies, secrets, and misdirection.
Every room holds potential clues, and it’s up to you to connect the dots and answer the crucial questions that will crack the case wide open.

This game emphasizes realism in detective work, requiring you to thoroughly explore each room, analyze relationships between the motel's guests, and decipher
their motivations. With puzzles woven into the investigation, you'll need sharp observation skills and relentless determination to uncover the truth.
Can you solve the mystery before time runs out?

Features:

- True-to-life detective experience: rely on your own instincts and attention to detail.
- No hand-holding: gather clues independently, and record everything you find.
- Complex character interactions: uncover hidden motives and secrets among the motel’s residents.
- Engaging puzzles: challenge your deductive reasoning alongside the investigation.
- Open-ended investigation: follow the trail of evidence to piece together the crime and reveal the murderer.

More Information: www.jandusoft.com/themotel
